# `r title`

```{r}
total_participants <- nrow(data)

total_male <- sum(data$gender_giver == 'M')

total_female <- sum(data$gender_giver == 'F')
```


## {height=25%}
```{r}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: "Total Participants"
list(
  icon = "person-arms-up",
  color = "success",
  value = total_participants
)
```

```{r}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: "Total Male"
list(
  icon = "gender-male",
  color = "primary",
  value = total_male
)
```

```{r}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: "Total Female"
list(
  icon = "gender-female",
  color = "danger",
  value = total_female
)
```
